Test Cases for the Eclispe Environment

These tests are intended to:
  • find out how to use the features provided by the environemnt in the correct and most performant way
  • identify changes in the environment that require adaptation of RMF
The following Environments are tested:
  • Sphinx
  • EMF
  • Xerces
The following execution environments are tested
  • Plain Java
  • Eclipse Headless
  • Eclipse including UI
